title: Fantasy Soundscapes
description: Pre constructed soundscapes for a high fantasy setting
longDescription:
Pack Demo

Fantasy soundscapes is a broad variety of pre-constructed audio effects to recreate locational ambience, perfect for adding depth and atmosphere to a various locations and scenes. Fantasy soundscapes tracks are perfect for looping infinitely and of course the epic marketplace gives you peace of mind for the using them in your commercial projects.
technicalDetails:
Features: 27 fantasy audio tracks and their relative music cues.


1.      Tavern fireplace

2.      Halfling village foreboding

3.      Halfling village

4.      Elven glade

5.      Docked at Ravenhelm

6.      Set sail

7.      Heroic voyage

8.      Sailing Serene

9.      Choppy waters

10.  Stormy Horizon

11.  Voyage through the storm

12.  Sea cave

13.  Gothic coast

14.  Beneath the cathedral

15.  Dungeon crawl

16.  Dungeon sewer

17.  Old Ruins

18.  Mountain river

19.  Mountain mist

20.  Lonely Mountain

21.  Titans Waterfall

22.  Valley of the Dwarven king

23.  Campfire Forest

24.  Night Forest

25.  Peaceful forest

26.  Burning Desert

27.  Mystic Sandstorm


Number of Audio Wavs: 27


Number of Audio Cues: 27


Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz


Does music loop: yes


Minutes of audio provided: 34:17


Supported Development Platforms: any


Windows: Yes


Mac: Yes
